title.narrative: Developing Rapid Assessment Reports for ACGF Green Infrastructure Projects

description.narrative: ASEAN Catalytic Green Finance Facility (ACGF) proposes to engage the services of GGGI to help in the origination of green infrastructure projects in Southeast Asia. The project will be conducted in two phases, with the initial phase screening and developing a longlist of projects for discussion with ADB, the ACGF and other partners, and the second phase identifying and structuring selected projects for potential financing from the ACGF and co-financing partners.

The objective of this project during 2020 and 2021 is to originate and structure bankable green infrastructure projects in ASEAN countries to bridge the investment gap for green infrastructure in the ASEAN region which is expected to mobilize both public and private capital for infrastructure investments to support ASEAN member countries in achieving climate targets.

mailing-address.narrative: Global Green Growth Institute, 19F Jeongdong Bldg., 21-15 Jeongdong-gil, Jung-gu Seoul 04523 Republic of Korea

title.narrative: Rapid Assessment Reports (RARs) are prepared for 2 prioritized projects
Submission of Long-list and presentation to ACGF PST and ADB
2 green infrastructure projects selected are included in the ADB ASEAN Catalytic Green Finance Facility (ACGF) pipeline.

description.narrative: 2 green infrastructure projects selected based on the Rapid Assessment Reports (RARs) prepared by GGGI

title.narrative: 2 green infrastructure projects are included in the ACGF pipeline.

ACGF/ADB/AIF’s equity resources together with concessional funds from development partners are leveraged, make green infrastructure projects viable and attract private capital for these projects across ASEAN countries.

description.narrative: Confirmation of ACGF financing to projects in their pipeline
